If you want better behavior in ranked, then make the cons of playing with trolls, jerks, or people who are just bad less permanent. Every season everyone who is in Bronze, Silver and maybe Gold should have their ELO erased, or at least ignored for their new provisionals. 

My logic? My first provisionals I won 4/10 and got Bronze 1, I lost a lot that year as I was still learning and I had a lot of bad luck with who I was placed with and against. The following year I won 6/10 and got Bronze 4. That is why "ELO-hell" is real; it's because good players suffer consequences that carry over from year to year for bad teams or just bad luck.

I don't think the higher ranks need it since Platinum, Diamond and up don't have to deal with "I start Blue with {{champion:107}} because I need mana, the bar starts empty." (actual quote from Bronze ELO)
